item.description:
Join hundreds of others and start a family tradition of coming for a trolley ride during the holiday season. Whether you ride a closed car or brave the cold to ride the open "electric sleigh", we promise you a good time and one that you'll remember for years. Join the motormen in singing traditional Christmas carols as the trolley makes its way through the "Tunnel of Lights". Returning to the Visitor Center, it's always a race to get into the warmth and enjoy a nice steaming cup of hot cocoa as you listen to the entertainment and admire all the model trains and displays. With a group of ten or more, tickets are just $9.00. Check it out...

http://www.ct-trolley....


Leave the hustle, bustle behind and enjoy the holidays as they were meant to be enjoyed! We will then continue the merriment at The Cracker Barrel for a yummy bite to eat with our "meetup" friends.

Come on out and celebrate the Holiday fun. We will meet at the museum and take the trolley at appoxamately 7pm. Then onto "The Barrel". View the fun menu...

http://www.crackerbar....

* THIS IS A CROSSPOST WITH EAT, LAUGH AND BE MERRY IN CT & THE WEST HARTFORD FUN BUNCH!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Chuck or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: WINTERFEST @ The CT Trolley Museum With A Bite At CRACKER BARREL!
